name: Lemmy The Rat
description:
The current build has no set 'win condition', nor can you actually create the potions, so for now just see if you can acquire the ingredients listed in the recipes in the starting room. You will need to solve puzzles to reach all of them, of course, but some items will need to be acquired by giving a different item to certain characters (talk to them to find out what they need)

Puzzle Mechanics:

Be wary of pits! Push a box into a pit to traverse safely

All boxes can fall into open pits,  but only metal boxes can fall into spike pits! (oh also, ice boxes slide!)

Lastly, there are the bells. Simply 'push' one like you do the boxes to ring it, and all the pillars of the same color will disappear like magic!
